Restore project dependencies:

```{r}
renv::restore()
```

Nearest neighbor detection:

```{r}
library(BiocNeighbors)
BNPARAM <- AnnoyParam()
```

Singular value decomposition:

```{r}
library(BiocSingular)
BSPARAM <- RandomParam()
```

Parallel evaluation:

```{r}
library(BiocParallel)

# BPP
BPPARAM <- MulticoreParam(
    workers = 6,
    stop.on.error = TRUE,
    RNGseed = 9999)
```
